ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT r.*,m.name,m.phone FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN pf_riselog r ON r.person_id=m.id INNER JOIN mm_relation rl ON rl.member_id=m.id WHERE rl.reg_merchant_id={merchant_id} AND r.type IN({type}) AND ({state}=-1 OR {state}=r.state) AND ('{keyword}' = '' OR (r.title LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.phone LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.usr LIKE '%{keyword}%')) ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
